meanings.definition: A woman who acts in plays, movies, or television shows.
meanings.sent1: The actresses rehearsed their lines together before the big performance.
meanings.sent2: Many actresses dream of winning an Oscar for their performances.
meanings.sent3: The actresses accidentally swapped costumes backstage and had to quickly switch back.
meanings.sent4: The actresses on stage were like shining stars, captivating the audience with their talent.
meanings.sent5: The actresses brought the characters to life with their emotional performances.

meanings.sent1: In the movie credits, you can see a long list of actresses who starred in the film.
meanings.sent2: She invited all her actress friends to the premiere of her new play.
meanings.sent3: The group of actresses decided to start a book club together.
meanings.sent4: The actresses stood together on stage, a united force of talent and beauty.
meanings.sent5: The actresses' dedication to their craft was evident in every scene they performed.
